Summary: watched an object come toward our house,then shifted to my right and moved very fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a golden object come toward my house, it was really moving fast, it them took a fast move to the right, and up. it was really moving like something was chasing it. then it was gone. I have been watching objects like this for the past two night. different times.the dogs were barking too.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 1st 2011
